original_text: “At that time the Lord said to me, ‘Cut for yourself two tablets of stone like the first, and come up to me on the mountain and make an ark of wood.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 내게 이르시기를 너는 처음과 같은 두 돌판을 다듬어 가지고 산에 올라 내게로 나아오고 또 나무궤 하나를 만들라

sentences.original_text: “At that time the Lord said to me,
'Cut for yourself two tablets of stone like the first,
sentences.korean_translation: 첫 것과 같은 돌판 둘을 너를 위해 깎고,

sentences.original_text: and come up to me on the mountain
and make an ark of wood.”
